definition: to turn over/to surge/to churn/to rummage/raging (torrent)
to turn over/to flip over/to overturn/to rummage through/to translate/to decode/to double/to climb over or into/to cross
to soar/to gallop/to prance/to turn over/to vacate/to clear

sentences.english: The ducks and geese puddled in the backyard.
sentences.chinese: 鴨子和鵝在後院泥水中翻騰。

sentences.english: Down the side of the mountain tumbled a foaming waterfall.
sentences.chinese: 在山的一側還有瀑布翻騰而下，撞擊出白色的水沫。

sentences.english: Resentment and rage seethe within him.
sentences.chinese: 怨恨與憤怒在他的內心翻騰。

sentences.english: Computation must seethe andbehaveas if it is alive.
sentences.chinese: 計算必須活潑潑地翻騰，表現。

sentences.english: The agitated mixture foamed and bubbled.
sentences.chinese: 翻騰的混合物不斷起泡沫。

sentences.english: When the blue wave rolls nightly on deep Galilee.
sentences.chinese: 加利利夜海翻騰藍色波浪。

sentences.english: He began to ransack his mother's workbox for a piece of thread.
sentences.chinese: 他要找一根線，開始翻騰哈哈哈針線盒。

sentences.english: Rills of muddy water rushed and swelled the stream and sund my boat.
sentences.chinese: 渾濁的流水奔湧翻騰，淹沒了我的紙船。

sentences.english: The seas are rising cloud water, Wuzhou Fenglei induced shock.
sentences.chinese: 四海翻騰雲水路，五洲震盪風雷激。

sentences.english: And because a strong wind was blowing, the sea was churning.
sentences.chinese: 因爲起了大風，海就翻騰起來。

sentences.english: Thee sea surges up with laughter, and pale gleams the smile of the sea-beach.
sentences.chinese: 大海歡笑着翻騰浪花，而海灘的微笑泛着暗淡的光。

sentences.english: Page 81: Hellfire billowed from the demon's mouth toward father and daughter.
sentences.chinese: 惡魔口中翻騰着的地獄般的火焰，向父親和女兒衝去。

sentences.english: Black plates were cut by jagged cracks of orange, violently shifting and roiling.
sentences.chinese: 黑色的巖板被劇烈翻騰的熔岩切割得層次不齊。

sentences.english: The sea surges up with laughter, and pale gleams the smile of the sea-beach.
sentences.chinese: 大海歡笑着翻騰浪花，而海灘的微笑泛着暗淡的光。

sentences.english: He's going to go his seventh dive, the forward one and a half somersaults with half twist.
sentences.chinese: 他準備做他的第七個動作，向前翻騰一週半轉體半周。

definition: to surge up violently (of ocean, river, lake etc)/turbulent
lit. ten thousand stampeding horses (idiom)/fig. with great momentum/going full speed ahead
no matter what/despite/to allow (sb to act arbitrarily)
to float/to hover/also written 漂浮
